title: Game didnt happen ?
body: I was playing a ranked game as shaco i was about 15/5 and we were wining then i got disconected i closed league relog and it was like the game didnt happen there is no record of it on match history so i asked my premade what happend he also didnt know i also cheeked recently played and the people that i played with werent on that list idk what happend pls fix i need my lp : (

replies.body:
It sounds like the game may have been lost to a hiccup in the system. Unfortunately, if you don't see the game by now, there's no way to recover the match. It will be as if the game never happened, so you won't have any loss in LP or your record.

Let me know if you have any other questions.
